about_the_game:
Looking for a fun new game to speed run? Is toy story one of your favorite movies? Are you a twitch streamer who's chat just like to see you suffer? Then do I have a game for you! Hype Hustle is a fast paced 3D platforming game where you play as a frustrated robot toy who just wants to rebuild his ship and leave behind his life in a suburban household.

Twitch Chat Integration: Once connected events will be voted on by your chat as well as random effects altering the game from bits and subscriptions. This game was intended to be speed run during hype trains to boost chat engagement.

General Randomization: Each run through the game will be randomized in order and locations of all the objectives / ability unlocks. No two runs should be exactly the same!

Global / Friend Leaderboards: Times are automatically recorded and added to several leaderboards tracking the best runs. Due to the high number of interactions that twitch chat can cause, leaderboards are based off of overall scores that adjust based on the number of interactions.

name: Hype Hustle
short_description: Hype Hustle is a speed running 3D platformer with twitch chat interactions built in. How quickly can you find and repair your spaceship before chat destroys you!
